item.description:
February Vacation Week! Russian Storytime
Speaker: Katie Green
Time: 3:30pm
Date: 02-18-2009
Description:
Katie Green, national award winning storyteller, returns to the Russian Museum of Icons during the February school vacation. Those who heard Katieâ€™s stories last Summer will not want to miss this exciting all-new progam! Hear about Vasilisa the Red's adventures with that famous Russian witch, Baba Yaga, who lives in a hut that stands on chicken feet and other exciting stories in this family program aimed at kids of all ages! Visit her website at www.katiegreenstories.com

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: February Vacation Week! Russian Storytime
